          <title>
            <string language="en">Structure of haemoglobin molecule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur des Hämoglobinmoleküls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure de molécule d'hémoglobine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura da molécula do haemoglobin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura della molecola dell'emoglobina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή του μορίου αιμογλοβίνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura de la molécula de la hemoglobina</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the four polypeptide chains that make up the overall structure of the haemoglobin molecule.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">haem group</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">haemoglobin molecule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen carrier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polypeptide chain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">proteins</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die vier Polypeptidketten, 
die die gesamte Struktur vom Hämoglobinmolekül bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les quatre chaînes de 
polypeptide qui composent la structure globale de la molécule 
d'hémoglobine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as quatro correntes do 
polypeptide que fazem acima a estrutura total da molécula do 
haemoglobin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le quattro catene del
polipeptide che compongono la struttura generale della molecola 
dell'emoglobina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τέσσερις polypeptide 
αλυσίδες που αποτελούν τη γενική δομή του μορίου αιμογλοβίνης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los cuatro 
encadenamientos del polipéptido que hacen para arriba la estructura 
total de la molécula de la hemoglobina.</string>
          </description>
